name: Spiral Splatter
description: Spiral Splatter is a brain-bending arcade puzzle game that will push your hand-eye coordination to the limit with nonstop, mind-boggling puzzles!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Dedicated Memory Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Dedicated Memory Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
